end-to-end neural architecture.from sentence: In this paper, we propose a new end-to-end neural architecture to address the machine comprehension problem as defined in the SQuAD dataset.

apply the Ptr-Net model.from sentence: We propose two ways to apply the Ptr-Net model for our task: a sequence model and a boundary model. We also further extend the boundary model with a search mechanism.

Pointer Net (Ptr-Net) model.enables: predictions of tokens from the input sequence
Pointer Net (Ptr-Net) model.generate: answers that consist of multiple tokens from the original text

adopt.from sentence: Specifically, observing that in the SQuAD dataset many questions are paraphrases of sentences from the original text, we adopt a match-LSTM model that we developed earlier for textual entailment (Wang & Jiang, 2016). We further adopt the Pointer Net (Ptr-Net) model developed by Vinyals et al. (2015), which enables the predictions of tokens from the input sequence only rather than from a larger fixed vocabulary and thus allows us to generate answers that consist of multiple tokens from the original text.
